Posts.Content: Jan 6, 2009 01:18PM jane44 wrote: I want to thank all of you for for comments.  They have been helpful.  I have read this board since I was first dx in July 2006.  All of you have such strength.  I hope to find the strength that you all have to fight this. Thank you.
Posts.Title: Recent Mets and scared jane44 jane44

Posts.Content: jane44 wrote: I am 44 years old.  I was dx with breast cancer July 2006 stage 3 c with 13 positive nodes.  I received chemo, rads, avastin.  On Nov 20 2008 I was dx with ovarian cancer with ca to abdominal cavity.  I had surgery on Nov 26 2008 and the path report stated it was from the breast.  They removed 90% of the cancer.  I was informed it would have been better if it were a new cancer.  My onco said I had 2 months with no treatment and if I was lucky a year.  I can not find any one with mets to ovaries.  My sister wants me to go to Houston TX to get a second opinion.  I am scared. Dx 7/10/2006, ILC, Grade 3, 13/20 nodes, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Recent Mets and scared jane44 jane44
